main.name: Ashwath Krishnan
main.description: Currently a sophomore at the University of Maryland, College Park, pursuing a bachelors degree in computer science, specializing in data science, as well as a minor in statistics.
main.bio: I am a 19 year old CS student who loves hip-music, anime, video games, tennis, PC hardware, and playing the piano.
main.contactmessage: If you want to get in touch with me, feel free to hit me up on any one of my social media accounts, or send me a message right here!

resume.skillmessage: I've been programming for about four years. Below are a list of my skills and proficiencies with various technologies.

education.description: Dove deeper into my love for computer science while simultaneously exploring other disciplines of interest, like mathematics, statistics, and business analytics.
Gained a well rounded academic foundation, the fundamentals of computer science, and some life-long friends.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Created a windows application using C# in order to grab archived mail data from an Appache Solr index and allow the user to modify the data without using the Solr Admin UI. Aditionally created a Google Chrome extension using ReactJS and vanilla JavaScript to help the developers easily manage their code reviews.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Managed strict typing for a high-level JavaScript codebase, using Facebook's Flow framework. Also used Docker and shell scripting to convert the company's development environment from a virtualization setup (Vagrant / Virtualbox) to a containerization setup, in order to increase efficiency.

projects.title: Partify
projects.category: Cross platform mobile application for multiple users to add to a Spotify queue

projects.title: Battle Royale Game
projects.category: 3rd Person Battle Royale game designed for a game design course

projects.title: ATP Stat Grapher
projects.category: Python tool to graph ATP tennis statistics and show trends

projects.title: Command Genie
projects.category: Windows Daemon application that scans email for incoming commands and runs them through command line.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
